name: Trickery's Miracle
desc: Can consume 100 points of Energy to use the ability and achieve Boundary Resonance with the Path of Elation, dealing Follow-Up ATK DMG of a random Type to all enemy targets for 5 â€“ 10 time(s). All allies' Basic ATK / Skill / Ultimate DMG is considered as Follow-Up ATK DMG for 2 turn(s).
